titles: Good counsell, to the petitioners for Presbyterian government, that they may declare their faith before they build their church.
author: Chidley, Katherine.
notes: Signed at foot: K.C. (i.e. Katherine Chidley).
Annotations on Thomason copy: "hidley" after 'K.C' at foot of titlepage; "Nouemb: 1st 1645".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Religious aspects --  Early works to 1800.
